context: I may have a celebrity crush on Bradley Cooper. Can you tell me some movies he's been in?
Bradley Cooper starred in The Words, a mystery thriller. He also starred in Limitless, a psychological thriller.
Oh, I don't think I've seen either of those, but I love thrillers! Who else was in The Words?
Ron Rifkin starred in the Words. he also starred in The Sum of All Fears
I don't think I know him. What else has he been in?
resp: Ron Rifkin starred in The Negotiator and Pulse
